headline: Indiana Greenlights New GenCo Assets Could Be a Game Changer For NiSource (NI)
summary: In September 2025, NiSource Inc. received approval from the Indiana Utility Regulatory Commission for NIPSCO Generation LLC (GenCo) to own, build, and manage generation assets to meet surging data center demand in Northern Indiana. This approval separates the costs of serving new data centers from existing NIPSCO retail customers, streamlining the company's ability to adapt to changing energy market needs while protecting broader customer interests. We'll explore how GenCo's regulatory...
